Verses.11: So do this, understanding the time. The hour has already come for you to awaken from sleep. For our salvation is to us now than when we first believed.
Verses.12: The night is almost over, and the day draws near. Let us set aside the deeds of darkness and put on the armor of light.
Verses.13: Let us behave properly, as in the daylight, not in carousing and drunkenness, not in sexual promiscuity and debauchery, not in quarreling and jealousy.
Verses.14: But put on the Lord Jesus Christ, and give no more thought to gratifying the desires of the flesh.
